text: Rachel Frances Shaw (born 1981) is an American actress, writer, director and producer. She played Bridgette Bird on the Showtime series SMILF. Shaw also played Mary Jo Cacciatore on the 2010â€“2011 Spike TV series Blue Mountain State, and her role as Shayla Nico in the first season of the USA Network television series Mr. Robot. ==References== Category:1986 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television writers Category:American television directors Category:Comedians from Boston Category:Actors from Boston Category:Writers from Boston Category:American television producers Category:People from Brookline, Massachusetts
title: Frankie Shaw
